name: Allen R. JOHNSON, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Johnson v. Commonwealth of Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Allen R. JOHNSON, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 15th day of September, 2009, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal, treated as a Petition for Review, is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
981 A.2d 1281
Allen R. JOHNSON, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 15, 2009.
